mapper.sql: s.id, s.uid, s.supplier_type, s.note, s.images, s.status, s.reply, s.create_time, s.update_time, s.update_by
mapper.delete: delete from td_user_supplier as s where s.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update:
update td_user_supplier
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_type = #{supplierType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
reply = #{reply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update td_user_supplier set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_type = #{supplierType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, reply = #{reply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
, u.uname as username
, c.uname as updatename
from td_user_supplier as s
left join td_user u on u.uid= s.uid
left join td_user c on c.uid= s.update_by
where 1=1
and s.status=#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and u.uname like CONCAT('%','${searchName}','%' )
